thread.title: Scottish unemployment levels up, says ONS
thread.title_full: Scottish unemployment levels up, says ONS - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Scottish unemployment levels up, says ONS
text:
55
Have your say THE number of people out of work in Scotland increased by 18,000 to 170,000 in the three months between June and August, new figures on unemployment showed.
Unemployment in Scotland also went up by 19,000 over the year, the Office for National Statistics (ONS) said.
Employment in Scotland decreased by 6,000 over the quarter, and fell slightly by 1,000 over the year, to stand at 2,610,000.
